title: I thrifted this Hello Kitty shirt
description: A vintage Hello Kitty graphic t-shirt found at a thrift store. This appears to be an authentic Sanrio licensed product featuring the classic Hello Kitty character design. The shirt shows good condition with vibrant colors and intact graphics.
platform_suggestions: eBay - Best for vintage character merchandise
Depop - Popular with Gen Z for Y2K fashion
Mercari - Strong market for Japanese brands
valuation_notes: Hello Kitty merchandise maintains strong resale value, especially vintage pieces. This shirt appears to be from the early 2000s based on the design style. Condition looks excellent which supports the higher end of the value range.

seo_meta.title: Vintage Hello Kitty Shirt Thrift Find - Worth $15-35
seo_meta.description: Found at a thrift store: authentic Hello Kitty graphic tee. See the estimated value and resale tips for this Sanrio vintage find.
